name: Out of bounce
description: This game was made for the explosin game jam. The theme of the jam was "Out of bounds" and so I made "Out of bounce". In this game you play as a rubber ball that wants to get to the flag of each level. But it can only move by jumping and every jump it does gets smaller and smaller. Controlls: choose direction with directional buttons or a and d. jump with space, directional button up or w. Note: This game might not work on WIndows because I couldn't test it on a windows computer. If it doesn't work please write it in the comments of this game!
